column1: The universal network heads. They say the Earthlings have become aware of the show, so it won't be funny anymore.
Everyone, can I have your attention real quick? Uuh, look, I just got a call from the network and I'm afraid Earth has been cancelled
Now, now, it was a great run and I think we should all be really proud.  Let's call in a demolition crew to strike the Earth for resources.
All right, kids, we'll take you to the network heads. But I warn you: nobody has ever gotten the executives to uncancel a show once the call has been made. Nobody.
